attributes.action: olivia stanca i want to live
attributes.additional_details: The NHS are allowing a 10 month old baby to die, due to them not willing to fund any of the medication she needs to survive. Olivia stanca is in Great ormond street where she is on dialysis, is fed through a tube and has a tracheostomy to allow her to breath. Olivia was born with cancer on her kidneys and when she was about 3 months old she had Chemotherapy and the consultants forgot to administer a drug to stop the radiation affecting her kidneys and other vital organs. Olivia wants to live  and her Parents are fighting for her to live, but the NHS want to stop her medication and watch as she dies.
